projects.title: Visitor Management System
projects.bodyText:
- A Multitenancy Django web and flutter mobile application for Building Management, Real estate Management and Visitor management
 -  Real-time Chat Capabilities
 - Invoice Generation
 - Users: - Building Owner, Company Admin, Employees, Security.
 - Generating QR Codes and scanning. 
 - Real Estate.
 Parking Management

projects.title: MERN Shopping List
projects.bodyText: - Simple Shopping List application built using Express, React, and Node.js. It allows users to add items and their prices.

projects.title: Cooling-system-LTD-mobile-application-and-web-admin-interface
projects.bodyText:
- A Mobile and a Web based application system for a cooling system
 -  Login: Users can create an account or sign in to an existing account using their email and password.
 - Dashboard: Provides an overview of all users and their registration status.
 - Settings: Allows admins to manage user accounts and customize system settings.

projects.title: React - Goal - List
projects.bodyText:
- simple web application built with React and styled with CSS.
 - It allows users to create and track their goals.

projects.title: Young-tech-course
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App that consumes data from https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com
 - Utilizes React and NodeJS
 - The Stylings are designed in Bootstrap and CSS

projects.title: Music-Playmate
projects.bodyText: - Simple music player application that allows users to play music from their local machine.

projects.title: Schedule App
projects.bodyText: - Android app in kotlin for scheduling tasks.
